ModMetaData.name: Bad Hygiene Plus
ModMetaData.author: Dubwise (original), Community (plus features)
ModMetaData.description:
An expansion mod for Dubs Bad Hygiene that adds:
• Heat Pumps - Reversible climate control systems that can both heat and cool • Electrolysis Systems - Split water into hydrogen and oxygen for power generation and life support
Heat Pumps: - More efficient than separate heater + AC systems - Automatically switches between heating and cooling modes - Heating disabled when outdoor temperature drops below -25°C
Electrolysis Features: - Electrolysis chambers that split water into H2 and O2 - Hydrogen fuel cells for clean power generation - Oxygen generators for emergency backup power - Gas storage tanks and distribution networks - Oxygen pumps for life support (Odyssey DLC integration planned)
This mod requires Dubs Bad Hygiene to function.
